Content:: Lalith Chandra Buddhisiri Dissanayake (born 19 November 1955) is a Sri Lankan politician,[1] a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka and a government minister. He is an alumnus of Dharmaraja College. In October 2000 he was elected Deputy Chairman of Committees, a position he held until October 2001.[2]  This article about a politician from Sabaragamuwa Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Lalith Dissanayake - Wikipedia
